games.title: Assassin's Creed
games.description: The first game in the series follows Altaïr, a skilled assassin during the Third Crusade who must redeem himself.

games.title: Assassin's Creed II
games.description: Follow Ezio's journey from a young nobleman to a Master Assassin in Renaissance Italy.

games.title: Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood
games.description: Ezio travels to Rome to rebuild the Assassin Brotherhood and take down the Borgia family.

games.title: Assassin's Creed III
games.description: Experience the American Revolution through the eyes of Connor, a Native American assassin.

games.title: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag
games.description: Sail the Caribbean as Edward Kenway, a pirate who becomes entangled with the Assassin Order.

games.title: Assassin's Creed Unity
games.description: Navigate the chaos of the French Revolution as Arno Dorian seeks redemption in Paris.

games.title: Assassin's Creed Syndicate
games.description: Control twin assassins Jacob and Evie Frye as they liberate London from Templar control.

games.title: Assassin's Creed Origins
games.description: Witness the origin of the Assassin Brotherhood in Ancient Egypt with Bayek of Siwa.

games.title: Assassin's Creed Odyssey
games.description: Choose your hero and explore Ancient Greece during the Peloponnesian War.

games.title: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
games.description: Lead your Viking clan to glory in 9th century England as Eivor, a fierce warrior.

characters.name: Altaïr Ibn-La'Ahad
characters.description: A member of the Assassin Order during the Third Crusade, known for his skills and arrogance turned wisdom.

characters.name: Ezio Auditore da Firenze
characters.description: A Florentine nobleman who becomes a legendary Master Assassin during the Italian Renaissance.

characters.name: Leonardo da Vinci
characters.description: The famous Renaissance artist and inventor who becomes a close friend and ally to Ezio.

characters.name: Ratonhnhaké:ton (Connor)
characters.description: A Native American assassin who fights for freedom during the American Revolution.

characters.name: Edward Kenway
characters.description: A Welsh pirate turned assassin who sails the Caribbean during the Golden Age of Piracy.

characters.name: Arno Dorian
characters.description: A French nobleman turned assassin seeking redemption during the French Revolution.

characters.name: Jacob Frye
characters.description: A brash and impulsive assassin who leads the Rooks gang in Victorian London.

characters.name: Evie Frye
characters.description: Jacob's twin sister, a tactical and stealth-focused assassin in Victorian London.

characters.name: Bayek of Siwa
characters.description: A Medjay protector who becomes one of the founders of the Hidden Ones in Ancient Egypt.

characters.name: Kassandra
characters.description: A Spartan mercenary with a mysterious past who becomes a legendary hero in Ancient Greece.

characters.name: Eivor Varinsdottir
characters.description: A fierce Viking warrior who leads their clan to settle in England during the 9th century.

characters.name: Rodrigo Borgia
characters.description: The Grand Master of the Italian Templars and later Pope Alexander VI.

locations.name: Jerusalem
locations.description: A holy city during the Third Crusade, divided into multiple districts with rich markets and ancient architecture.

locations.name: Florence
locations.description: The birthplace of the Renaissance, home to artists, merchants, and the powerful Medici family.

locations.name: Rome
locations.description: The eternal city under Borgia control, featuring ancient ruins and Renaissance grandeur.

locations.name: Boston
locations.description: A colonial American city at the heart of revolutionary activity and conflict.

locations.name: Caribbean Sea
locations.description: A vast naval playground filled with islands, hidden coves, and pirate havens.

locations.name: Paris
locations.description: The capital of France during the Revolution, featuring iconic landmarks and chaotic streets.

locations.name: London
locations.description: The industrial heart of the British Empire, divided between rich and poor districts.

locations.name: Ancient Egypt
locations.description: A land of pyramids, deserts, and the mighty Nile during the Ptolemaic period.

locations.name: Ancient Greece
locations.description: The cradle of Western civilization during the Peloponnesian War between Athens and Sparta.

locations.name: Dark Ages England
locations.description: A land of warring kingdoms and Viking settlements during the age of Norse expansion.
